original_text: And their brethren, heads of the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and threescore; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.
korean_text: 또 그의 형제들이니 종족의 가문의 우두머리라 하나님의 성전의 임무를 수행할 힘있는 자는 모두 천칠백육십 명이더라

sentences.original_text: heads of the house of their fathers
a thousand and seven hundred and threescore
for the work of the service of the house of God
